settings.chunksfadein.animate_near_playe: Controls whether chunks in the 3x3 area centered at player's position are animated.
settings.chunksfadein.animate_with_dh.to: Controls whether to animate Minecraft chunks if Distant Horizons LOD rendering is enabled.
settings.chunksfadein.animation_angle.to:
Controls the angle by which the start position is rotated.
0° is directly vertical, 90° is horizontal (away from the player).
Used only for 'Full' animation type.
settings.chunksfadein.animation_curve.to: Controls the speed of the chunk's movement relative to time.
Controls whether chunk motion animation is played.
settings.chunksfadein.animation_factor.t:
Controls the intensity of the animation.
Ignored if 'Full' animation type is used.
settings.chunksfadein.animation_start.to:
Controls the start position of chunk's movement.
Used only for 'Full' animation type.
settings.chunksfadein.animation_time.too: Controls the time it takes for chunk animation to end.
settings.chunksfadein.fade_enabled.toolt:
Controls whether chunk fading is enabled.
Fading is done by gradually mixing chunk's color with fog color.
settings.chunksfadein.fade_near_player.t: Controls whether chunks in the 3x3 area centered at player's position are faded.
settings.chunksfadein.fade_time.tooltip: Controls the time it takes for chunks to fade in fully.
settings.chunksfadein.fog_override.toolt:
Controls whether to override fog color by the sky color below it. This fixes the issue of seeing terrain silhouettes against the sky. If you see sun/moon through terrain or you don't like how it looks, you can try tweaking this.

Cylindrical (render) fog - visible at the edge of the render distance.
Spherical (environmental) fog (introduced in 1.21.6) is visible anywhere and scales with distance, so it creates that "haze" effect.

Controls whether to override fog color by the sky color below it. This fixes the issue of seeing terrain silhouettes against the sky. If you see sun/moon through terrain or you don't like how it looks, you can try tweaking this.
settings.chunksfadein.iris_warning: This option can cause issues when used with shaders.
settings.chunksfadein.mod_enabled.toolti:
If disabled, fade, animation and world curvature are also disabled.
You can also assing a keybind to toggle this without using this menu.
settings.chunksfadein.mod_tab_enabled.to: Controls whether the Chunks Fade In tab is added to Sodium settings.
settings.chunksfadein.mod_tab_tooltip: This is forcefully enabled, because ModMenu is not installed.
settings.chunksfadein.title: Chunks Fade In mod settings
settings.chunksfadein.update_notifier_en: Enables the update notifier when joining a world.
settings.chunksfadein.world_curvature.to:
Controls the circumference of the world.
Negative values make it curl up instead of down.
settings.chunksfadein.world_curvature_en: If enabled, the world will be curved, as if the world was a spherical planet.
